00054 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 //  ENUM : sc_time_unit
00056 //
00057 //  Enumeration of time units.
00058 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00060 enum sc_time_unit
00061 {
00062     SC_FS = 0,
00063     SC_PS,
00064     SC_NS,
00065     SC_US,
00066     SC_MS,
00067     SC_SEC
00068 };

00078 class SC_API sc_time
00079 {
00080 public:
00081 
00082     typedef sc_dt::uint64 value_type;
00083 
00084     // constructors
00085 
00086     sc_time();
00087     sc_time( const sc_time& );
00088 
00089     sc_time( double, sc_time_unit );
00090     sc_time( double, sc_time_unit, sc_simcontext* );
00091 
00092     // convert time unit from string
00093     // "fs"/"SC_FS"->SC_FS, "ps"/"SC_PS"->SC_PS, "ns"/"SC_NS"->SC_NS, ...
00094     sc_time( double, const char* unit );
00095     sc_time( double, const char* unit, sc_simcontext* );
00096 
00097     static sc_time from_value( value_type );
00098     static sc_time from_seconds( double );
00099     static sc_time from_string( const char * str );
00100 
00101     // deprecated, use from_value(v)
00102     sc_time( double, bool scale );
00103     sc_time( value_type, bool scale );
00104 
00105     // assignment operator
00106 
00107     sc_time& operator = ( const sc_time& );
00108 
00109 
00110     // conversion functions
00111 
00112     value_type value() const;      // relative to the time resolution
00113     double to_double() const;  // relative to the time resolution
00114     double to_default_time_units() const;
00115     double to_seconds() const;
00116     const std::string to_string() const;
00117 
00118 
00119     // relational operators
00120 
00121     bool operator == ( const sc_time& ) const;
00122     bool operator != ( const sc_time& ) const;
00123     bool operator <  ( const sc_time& ) const;
00124     bool operator <= ( const sc_time& ) const;
00125     bool operator >  ( const sc_time& ) const;
00126     bool operator >= ( const sc_time& ) const;
00127 
00128 
00129     // arithmetic operators
00130 
00131     sc_time& operator += ( const sc_time& );
00132     sc_time& operator -= ( const sc_time& );
00133 
00134     friend const sc_time operator + ( const sc_time&, const sc_time& );
00135     friend const sc_time operator - ( const sc_time&, const sc_time& );
00136 
00137     sc_time& operator *= ( double );
00138     sc_time& operator /= ( double );
00139     sc_time& operator %= ( const sc_time& );
00140 
00141     friend const sc_time operator * ( const sc_time&, double );
00142     friend const sc_time operator * ( double, const sc_time& );
00143     friend const sc_time operator / ( const sc_time&, double );
00144     friend double        operator / ( const sc_time&, const sc_time& );
00145     friend const sc_time operator % ( const sc_time&, const sc_time& );
00146 
00147 
00148     // print function
00149 
00150     void print( ::std::ostream& os = std::cout ) const;
00151 
00152 private:
00153 
00154     value_type m_value;
00155 };

00157 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 //  CLASS : sc_time_tuple
00159 //
00160 //  The time tuple helper class.
00161 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 
00163 class SC_API sc_time_tuple
00164 {
00165     typedef sc_time::value_type value_type;
00166     friend class sc_time;
00167 
00168 private:
00169     explicit sc_time_tuple( value_type v );
00170     void init( value_type v );
00171 
00172 public:
00173     sc_time_tuple()
00174       : m_value(), m_unit( SC_SEC ), m_offset(1) {}
00175 
00176     sc_time_tuple( const sc_time & t );
00177 
00178     bool         has_value()   const;
00179     value_type   value()       const;
00180     sc_time_unit unit()        const { return m_unit; } // normalized unit
00181     const char * unit_symbol() const;                   // normalized unit symbol
00182 
00183     operator sc_time() const { return sc_time( to_double(), m_unit ); }
00184 
00185     double      to_double() const; // relative to the normalized unit
00186     std::string to_string() const;
00187 
00188 private:
00189     value_type   m_value;
00190     sc_time_unit m_unit;
00191     unsigned     m_offset;
00192 };
00193

00195 
00196 inline ::std::ostream& operator << ( ::std::ostream&, const sc_time& );

00201 extern SC_API const sc_time SC_ZERO_TIME;
00202 
00203 // constructors
00204 
00205 inline
00206 sc_time::sc_time()
00207 : m_value( 0 )
00208 {}
00209 
00210 inline
00211 sc_time::sc_time( const sc_time& t )
00212 : m_value( t.m_value )
00213 {}
00214 
00215 inline
00216 sc_time_tuple::sc_time_tuple( value_type v )
00217   : m_value(), m_unit( SC_SEC ), m_offset(1)
00218 {
00219     if( v )
00220         init( v );
00221 }
00222 
00223 inline
00224 sc_time_tuple::sc_time_tuple( const sc_time& t )
00225   : m_value(), m_unit( SC_SEC ), m_offset(1)
00226 {
00227     if( t != SC_ZERO_TIME )
00228         init( t.value() );
00229 }
00230 
00231 inline
00232 sc_time
00233 sc_time::from_seconds( double v )
00234 {
00235     return sc_time( v, SC_SEC );
00236 }
00237

00239 // assignment operator
00240 
00241 inline
00242 sc_time&
00243 sc_time::operator = ( const sc_time& t )
00244 {
00245     m_value = t.m_value;
00246     return *this;
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 // conversion functions
00251 
00252 inline
00253 sc_time::value_type
00254 sc_time::value() const  // relative to the time resolution
00255 {
00256     return m_value;
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00260 inline
00261 double
00262 sc_time::to_double() const  // relative to the time resolution
00263 {
00264     return sc_dt::uint64_to_double( m_value );
00265 }
00266 
00267 
00268 inline
00269 double
00270 sc_time_tuple::to_double() const // relative to the normalized time unit
00271 {
00272     return sc_dt::uint64_to_double( m_value ) * m_offset;
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 inline
00277 const std::string
00278 sc_time::to_string() const
00279 {
00280     return sc_time_tuple( *this ).to_string();
00281 }

00336     return *this;

00348 inline
00349 const sc_time
00350 operator + ( const sc_time& t1, const sc_time& t2 )
00351 {
00352     return sc_time( t1 ) += t2;
00353 }
00354 
00355 inline
00356 const sc_time
00357 operator - ( const sc_time& t1, const sc_time& t2 )
00358 {
00359     return sc_time( t1 ) -= t2;

00361 
00362 
00363 inline
00364 sc_time&
00365 sc_time::operator *= ( double d )
00366 {
00367     // linux bug workaround; don't change next two lines
00368     volatile double tmp = sc_dt::uint64_to_double( m_value ) * d + 0.5;
00369     m_value = static_cast<sc_dt::int64>( tmp );
00370     return *this;
00371 }
00372 
00373 inline
00374 sc_time&
00375 sc_time::operator /= ( double d )
00376 {
00377     // linux bug workaround; don't change next two lines
00378     volatile double tmp = sc_dt::uint64_to_double( m_value ) / d + 0.5;
00379     m_value = static_cast<sc_dt::int64>( tmp );
00380     return *this;
00381 }
00382 
00383 inline
00384 sc_time&
00385 sc_time::operator %= ( const sc_time& t )
00386 {
00387     m_value %= t.m_value;
00388     return *this;
00389 }
00390 
00391 inline
00392 const sc_time
00393 operator * ( const sc_time& t, double d )
00394 {
00395     sc_time tmp( t );
00396     return tmp *= d;
00397 }
00398 
00399 inline
00400 const sc_time
00401 operator * ( double d, const sc_time& t )
00402 {
00403     sc_time tmp( t );
00404     return tmp *= d;
00405 }
00406 
00407 inline
00408 const sc_time
00409 operator / ( const sc_time& t, double d )
00410 {
00411     sc_time tmp( t );
00412     return tmp /= d;
00413 }
00414 
00415 inline
00416 double
00417 operator / ( const sc_time& t1, const sc_time& t2 )
00418 {
00419     return ( t1.to_double() / t2.to_double() );
00420 }
00421 
00422 inline
00423 const sc_time
00424 operator % ( const sc_time& t1, const sc_time& t2 )
00425 {
00426     sc_time tmp(t1);
00427     return tmp %= t2;
00428 }
00429 
00430 // print operator
00431 
00432 inline
00433 ::std::ostream&
00434 operator << ( ::std::ostream& os, const sc_time& t )
00435 {
00436     t.print( os );
00437     return os;
00438 }

00441 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00442 //  STRUCT : sc_time_params
00443 //
00444 //  Struct that holds the time resolution and default time unit.
00445 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00446 
00447 struct SC_API sc_time_params
00448 {
00449     double time_resolution;             // in femto seconds
00450     bool   time_resolution_specified;
00451     bool   time_resolution_fixed;
00452 
00453     sc_time::value_type default_time_unit;              // in time resolution
00454     bool                default_time_unit_specified;
00455 
00456     sc_time_params();
00457     ~sc_time_params();
00458 };
